entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
